snippet: Steven Amato, chief content officer at Omelet, Los Angeles, was named president, a new post, and chief content officer of a new division, Omelet Studio.
lead_paragraph: Steven Amato, chief content officer at Omelet, Los Angeles, was named president, a new post, and chief content officer of a new division, Omelet Studio.
